# Perplexity AI Clone - Frontend Engineer Assignment

This is a pixel-perfect clone of Perplexity AI's chat interface built with:
- Next.js (App Router)
- TailwindCSS
- shadcn/ui components
- TanStack Query
- Light mode theme

## Project Structure
- Landing page with hero section and search bar
- Chat interface with streaming AI responses
- Multi-turn conversations
- Pixel-perfect UI replication of Perplexity AI

## API Integration
Uses mock streaming API: https://mock-askperplexity.piyushhhxyz.deno.net
- Progressive loading states
- Source citations
- Word-by-word streaming responses

## Development Guidelines
- Focus on pixel-perfect UI matching
- Implement smooth animations and transitions
- Handle question scroll behavior
- Auto-scroll functionality
- New chat reset capability
